title: Eyes of Black: An Elemental Romance
description: Endless life as an Air Elemental. A blessing or a curse?I'm due to wed a man I barely know, start and end my last year in high school pretending to be a mortal, and keep my secret from everyone, including my confidant and butler, Mr. Black.I'd say it's a curse.The Eyes of Black is the first book in the Elemental Romance series, but can be read as a standalone. HEA guaranteed. Perhaps for fans of Twilight and slow-burn fantasy/paranormal romances.
author: Abby McCormick
